snippet.title: I left Ubisoft to make my dream game. (devlog Dawnfolk)
snippet.description:
Have you ever wanted to make your own strategy game? I've always dreamed of creating a classic 2D grid world with my own ideas incorporated. Follow along in this devlog series to see how I'm turning that dream into a reality.
Dawnfolk is a charmingly dark minimalist survival city-builder. Collect resources and rebuild your realm one tile at a time as you protect your settlers from oppressive shadows. Can you unveil the secrets of the monoliths to bring light back to the world? 
Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2308630/Dawnfolk/

Chapters:
00:00 intro
00:35 origins of the game
02:24 game core ideas
03:51 a "minimalist" game
05:09 game mechanics and system
06:32 outro
